Model Module
============

The Model module is responsible for managing the data logic of the application. It acts as an intermediate layer between the database and the controllers, providing methods to access, manipulate and store the necessary data. Each file within this module contains a class that represents a specific entity and its interaction with the database, implementing functions to perform CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) and other related operations.

-----------------
